archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Define Party PII Privacy Standards
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: define the standards that must be applied to PII (Personally Identifiable Information) during the retention, storage and processing. This includes roles, responsibilities, obligations and privileges of all Engaged Parties

properties.value: The Define Party PII Privacy Standards process is used :â€¨ - to define the roles of each engaged party - to define the responsibilities of each engaged party - to define the obligations of each engaged party - to define the privileges of each engaged party
